description_txt: stated on March 13, 2016 in Donald Trump on Sunday, March 13th, 2016, in an interview on "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: Says a YouTube video shows Thomas DiMassimo, the man who rushed Trump at an Ohio rally, "dragging the American flag on the ground like it was a piece of garbage."

description_txt: stated on March 7, 2016 in a news conference:
quote_txt: California "cut about $1.3 billion in child care (during the recession). We’ve only reinvested about $300 million."

description_txt: stated on January 15, 2016 in a news release:
quote_txt: "The [Obama] administration’s regulatory assault on coal-fired energy has put thousands of Americans out of work"

description_txt: stated on March 13, 2016 in an interview with NBC's "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama has "been presiding over our jobs going overseas for seven years."

description_txt: stated on November 21, 2015 in a TV ad that ran mostly in Iowa:
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump and Marco Rubio opposed Cruz’s "efforts to defund Planned Parenthood."

description_txt: stated on February 17, 2016 in a speech posted on Medium:
quote_txt: "Gun violence is by far the leading cause of death for young African American men, outstripping the next nine causes of death combined."

description_txt: stated on February 24, 2016 in an interview with Gloria Steinem:
quote_txt: "More lives are lost from violence against women, sex-selective abortion, female infanticide, suicide, egregious maternal mortality, and other sex-linked causes than were lost during all of the wars and civil strife of the 20th century."

description_txt: stated on March 9, 2016 in a post on his Facebook page:
quote_txt: "Roy Cooper won't say how he will pay for ‘free’ college tuition."

description_txt: stated on February 23, 2016 in a campaign speech:
quote_txt: The U.S. "doesn’t make television sets anymore."

description_txt: stated on March 8, 2016 in a Facebook meme:
quote_txt: The rate of U.S. female homicide victims outnumbers 24 other developed countries by more than 2½ to 1.
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • March 14, 2016

description_txt: stated on March 9, 2016 in a letter sent to union members:
quote_txt: Susie Lee and her husband "own 17 homes across the country and use their private jet to take vacations," and invest in "companies like Walmart, Halliburton and GEO Group."

description_txt: stated on October 25, 2015 in a blog post and subsequently reposted on Facebook.:
quote_txt: Says Hillary Clinton told the Des Moines Register on Aug. 8, 2015: "I will get the NRA shut down for good if I become president. If we can ban handguns, we will do it."

description_txt: stated on February 22, 2016 in a statement:
quote_txt: "One would have to go back more than a century to find a scenario where a president’s nominee for the Supreme Court was confirmed by the opposition party in the Senate when the vacancy occurred during an election year."

description_txt: stated on March 8, 2016 in Department of Homeland Security hearing:
quote_txt: "We understand that this heroin is primarily coming from Mexico, over the border."

description_txt: stated on March 4, 2016 in a Columbia/Boone County League of Women Voters Town Hall:
quote_txt: "Seventy percent of Missourians support voter photo ID legislation."

description_txt: stated on February 23, 2016 in a campaign rally.:
quote_txt: "The Walton family of Walmart ... This one family owns more wealth than the bottom 40 percent of the American people."

description_txt: stated on March 13, 2016 in an interview on "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: Says the man who rushed the stage at him in Dayton, Ohio, "had chatter about ISIS, or with ISIS" in his social media posts.

description_txt: stated on March 13, 2016 in an interview on "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: "More than once, I've actually had a conversation with the protesters on substance."

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2016 in a Hillary for America ad:
quote_txt: "Americans haven’t had a raise in 15 years."

description_txt: stated on November 21, 2015 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says Ted Cruz’s wife Heidi "will be the very first pro-life first lady."

description_txt: stated on February 5, 2016 in a public forum:
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama "has the legal authority to let in really however many refugees he wants, from whatever country."

description_txt: stated on March 7, 2016 in a radio ad:
quote_txt: "Republican Bob Donovan" has "run as a Republican time and again."

description_txt: stated on March 11, 2016 in a GOP debate at the University of Miami:
quote_txt: Foreign aid "is less than 1 percent of our federal budget."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • March 11, 2016

description_txt: stated on March 10, 2016 in the Miami GOP debate.:
quote_txt: "GDP was zero essentially for the last two quarters."

description_txt: stated on March 10, 2016 in the Republican debate in Miami:
quote_txt: "I opposed TPP (Trans-Pacific Partnership) and have always opposed TPP."

description_txt: stated on March 10, 2016 in in a GOP debate in Miami:
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump "has said he wants to be neutral on Israel and the Palestinians"

description_txt: stated on March 10, 2016 in a GOP debate in Miami:
quote_txt: Common Core is "education through Washington D.C."

description_txt: stated on March 7, 2016 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "As a legislator, (Marco Rubio) flipped on a key vote after making a quick $200,000 from selling the house to the mother of the bill's lobbyist."

description_txt: stated on March 9, 2016 in a Democratic presidential debate in Miami:
quote_txt: In 2006, Bernie Sanders "voted in the House with hard-line Republicans for indefinite detention for undocumented immigrants, and then he sided with those Republicans to stand with vigilantes known as Minutemen who were taking up outposts along the border to hunt down immigrants."

description_txt: stated on February 22, 2016 in an interview with CNN's Carol Costello.:
quote_txt: "Now we have ISIS coming over the (U.S.-Mexico) border."
